alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 11:35PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northwestern Collier, northwestern Hendry and Glades Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1134 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Basinger to near Pine Island Center. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Labelle, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Palmdale, Buckhead Ridge, Immokalee, Golden Gate Estates, Port La Belle, Brighton Seminole Reservation, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, Naples Park, Felda, Ortona, Muse, North Naples, Golden Gate, East Naples and Orangetree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County
